knowledge.heading: Sacred Discovery Through Loss
knowledge.description: The text suggests that profound spiritual and emotional discoveries can only be fully understood through their loss. What initially appears as secular experience reveals deeper sacred meaning when viewed retrospectively.
knowledge.pattern_connection: The retrospective narration transforms personal memory into universal meditation, allowing secular experiences to be reinterpreted as encounters with divine grace.

device_examples.effect: The garden door becomes a sacred threshold into an enchanted world that must be lost to be understood.

device_examples.quote: but it was not until Sebastian
device_examples.effect: Establishes the retrospective voice that transforms personal discovery into universal spiritual meditation.
